participant_1.background:
I fear being judged for my physical appearance.
I play the flute to bring peace and tranquility to my surroundings.
I'm feeling good about my health and my dogs are my best friends.
i m a older woman.
My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.

participant_2.background:
I do not have my own home yet.
i love agatha christie novels.
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
i still like unicorns even though i m an adult.
I'm not sure if I'll be able to balance my work and my personal life.

content.text: I'm good! I'm trying to figure out how to balance my work and personal life.
I know what you mean. I have trouble with that too.
I'm glad I'm not alone. What do you do for work?
I'm an older woman and I stay at home and take care of my dogs.
That sounds really nice. I'm a potter and I love my job but it's hard to find the time to do it all.
I love pottery! I used to take lessons but I haven't had time in a while.
You should take it up again! It's really relaxing and I love making things.
I think I will. Thanks for the encouragement.
You're welcome! I love to talk about pottery.
Me too! What's your favorite thing to make?
I love making vases and bowls. They're so easy to make and they look beautiful.
I agree! Vases and bowls are so useful.
They are! I love giving them as gifts too.
I'm sure your friends and family love getting them.
They do! They always tell me how much they love them.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your work.
You're welcome! I'm glad to hear that.
